sen.j: 坪井遺跡（つぼいいせき）とは、橿原市常盤町と桜井市大福にまたがる弥生時代中期・後期の遺跡。
sen.e: Tsuboi Remains are the series of remains from the mid to the late Yayoi period, located across Tokiwa-cho, Kashihara City to Daifuku, Sakurai City.
Tsuboi Remains are the series of remains from the mid to the late Yayoi period, located across Tokiwa-cho, Kashihara City to Daifuku, Sakurai City.
Tsuboi Remains are the series of remains from the mid to the late Yayoi period, located across Tokiwa-cho, Kashihara City to Daifuku, Sakurai City.

sen.j: 井戸と墓地群などの遺構が確認
sen.e: Remains of water well and series of tombs have been discovered from the site.
Remains of water well and series of tombs have been discovered from the site.
Remains of water well and series of tombs have been discovered from the site.

sen.j: 棺内に人骨が残った木棺墓が2基検出
sen.e: Two sets of wooden coffin have been discovered, which contained the bones of a person in each coffin.
Two sets of wooden coffin have been discovered, which contained the bones of a person in each coffin.
Two sets of wooden coffin have been discovered, which contained the bones of a person in each coffin.

sen.j: 土器、石器、木製品、獣骨などの大量の遺物
sen.e: Large number of earthenware, stone implement, wooden products and animal bones have been excavated from the site.
Large number of earthenware, stone implement, wooden products and animal bones have been excavated from the site.
Large number of earthenware, stone implement, wooden products and animal bones have been excavated from the site.

sen.j: 銅剣を模して作られた木製の柄頭なども出土
sen.e: Furthermore, some wooden pieces of sword's grip end imitating a copper-made sword have been discovered.
Furthermore, some wooden pieces of sword's grip end imitating a copper-made sword have been discovered.
Furthermore, some wooden pieces of sword's grip end imitating a copper-made sword have been discovered.

sen.j: 1974年（昭和49年）、橿原考古学研究所が調査。
sen.e: In 1974, Archaeological Institute of Kashihara operated the research of Tsuboi remains.
In 1974, Archaeological Institute of Kashihara operated the research of Tsuboi Remains.
In 1974, Archaeological Institute of Kashihara operated the research of Tsuboi Remains.

sen.j: それ以降は、桜井市教委が調査を継続。
sen.e: After the completion of this research operation, Sakurai City Board of Education succeeded the research for further investigation.
After the completion of this research operation, Sakurai City Board of Education succeeded the research for further investigation.
After the completion of this research operation, Sakurai City Board of Education succeeded the research for further investigation.
